Allen Iverson scored 19 points, and Tayshaun Prince added 16 to help the Pistons win their fifth straight game, 83-75 over the New Jersey Nets on Wednesday. When any team in the league loses three of their top six guys, things are going to change for them, Pistons coach Michael Beasley Curry said.`` Luckily, a lot of other guys stepped up.''
